verses.verse: "For the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> is like <WG3664> a landowner <WG3617> who <WG3748> went <WG1831> out early <WG260> in the morning <WG4404> to hire <WG3409> laborers <WG2040> for his vineyard. <WG290>
"And when he had agreed <WG4856> with the laborers <WG2040> for a denarius <WG1220> for the day, <WG2250> he sent <WG649> them into his vineyard. <WG290>
"And he went <WG1831> out about <WG4012> the third <WG5154> hour <WG5610> and saw <WG3708> others <WG243> standing <WG2476> idle <WG692> in the market <WG58> place; <WG58>

and to those <WG1565> he said, <WG3004> 'You too <WG2532> go <WG5217> into the vineyard, <WG290> and whatever <WG3739> <WG1437> is right <WG1342> I will give <WG1325> you.' And [so] they went. <WG565>
"Again <WG3825> he went <WG1831> out about <WG4012> the sixth <WG1623> and the ninth <WG7067> hour, <WG5610> and did <WG4160> the same <WG5615> thing. <WG5615>

"And about <WG4012> the eleventh <WG1734> [hour] he went <WG1831> out, and found <WG2147> others <WG243> standing; <WG2476> and he said <WG3004> to them, 'Why <WG5101> have you been standing <WG2476> here <WG5602> idle <WG692> all <WG3650> day <WG2250> long?'
"They said <WG3004> to him, 'Because <WG3754> no <WG3762> one <WG3762> hired <WG3409> us.' He said <WG3004> to them, 'You too <WG2532> go <WG5217> into the vineyard. <WG290>'

"And when evening <WG3798> had come, <WG1096> the owner <WG2962> of the vineyard <WG290> said <WG3004> to his foreman, <WG2012> 'Call <WG2564> the laborers <WG2040> and pay <WG591> them their wages, <WG3408> beginning <WG757> with the last <WG2078> [group] to the first. <WG4413>'
"And when those <WG3588> [hired] about <WG4012> the eleventh <WG1734> hour <WG5610> came, <WG2064> each <WG303> one <WG303> received <WG2983> a denarius. <WG1220>

"And when those <WG3588> [hired] first <WG4413> came, <WG2064> they thought <WG3543> that they would receive <WG2983> more; <WG4183> and they also <WG2532> received <WG2983> each <WG303> one <WG303> a denarius. <WG1220>
"And when they received <WG2983> it, they grumbled <WG1111> at the landowner, <WG3617>

saying, <WG3004> 'These <WG3778> last <WG2078> men <WG2078> have worked <WG4160> [only] one <WG1520> hour, <WG5610> and you have made <WG4160> them equal <WG2470> to us who <WG3588> have borne <WG941> the burden <WG922> and the scorching <WG2742> heat <WG2742> of the day. <WG2250>'
"But he answered <WG611> and said <WG3004> to one <WG1520> of them, 'Friend, <WG2083> I am doing <WG91> you no <WG3756> wrong; <WG91> did you not agree <WG4856> with me for a denarius <WG1220>?
'Take <WG142> what <WG3588> is yours <WG4674> and go <WG5217> your way, <WG5217> but I wish <WG2309> to give <WG1325> to this <WG3778> last <WG2078> man <WG2078> the same <WG2532> as to you.

'Is it not lawful <WG1832> for me to do <WG4160> what <WG3739> I wish <WG2309> with what <WG3588> is my own <WG1699>? Or <WG2228> is your eye <WG3788> envious <WG4190> because <WG3754> I am <WG1510> generous <WG18>?'
"Thus <WG3779> the last <WG2078> shall be first, <WG4413> and the first <WG4413> last. <WG2078>"

And as Jesus <WG2424> was about <WG3195> to go <WG305> up to Jerusalem, <WG2414> He took <WG3880> the twelve <WG1427> [disciples] aside by themselves, <WG2398> and on the way <WG3598> He said <WG3004> to them,

"Behold, <WG2400> we are going <WG305> up to Jerusalem; <WG2414> and the Son <WG5207> of Man <WG444> will be delivered <WG3860> to the chief <WG749> priests <WG749> and scribes, <WG1122> and they will condemn <WG2632> Him to death, <WG2288>
and will deliver <WG3860> Him to the Gentiles <WG1484> to mock <WG1702> and scourge <WG3146> and crucify <WG4717> [Him,] and on the third <WG5154> day <WG2250> He will be raised <WG1453> up. "
Then <WG5119> the mother <WG3384> of the sons <WG5207> of Zebedee <WG2199> came <WG4334> to Him with her sons, <WG5207> bowing <WG4352> down, <WG4352> and making <WG154> a request <WG154> of Him.

And He said <WG3004> to her, "What <WG5101> do you wish <WG2309>?" She said <WG3004> to Him, "Command <WG3004> that in Your kingdom <WG932> these <WG3778> two <WG1417> sons <WG5207> of mine <WG1473> may sit, <WG2523> one <WG1520> on Your right <WG1188> and one <WG1520> on Your left. <WG2176>"

But Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said, <WG3004> "You do not know <WG3609> what <WG5101> you are asking <WG154> for. Are you able <WG1410> to drink <WG4095> the cup <WG4221> that I am <WG3195> about <WG3195> to drink <WG4095>?" They said <WG3004> to Him, "We are able. <WG1410>"

He said <WG3004> to them, "My cup <WG4221> you shall drink; <WG4095> but to sit <WG2523> on My right <WG1188> and on [My] left, <WG2176> this <WG3778> is not Mine <WG1699> to give, <WG1325> but it is for those for whom <WG3739> it has been prepared <WG2090> by My Father. <WG3962>"
And hearing <WG191> [this,] the ten <WG1176> became indignant <WG23> with the two <WG1417> brothers. <WG80>

But Jesus <WG2424> called <WG4341> them to Himself, and said, <WG3004> "You know <WG3609> that the rulers <WG758> of the Gentiles <WG1484> lord <WG2634> it over <WG2634> them, and [their] great <WG3173> men <WG3173> exercise <WG2715> authority <WG2715> over <WG2715> them.
" It is not so <WG3779> among <WG1722> you, but whoever <WG3739> <WG1437> wishes <WG2309> to become <WG1096> great <WG3173> among <WG1722> you shall be your servant, <WG1249>
and whoever <WG3739> <WG1437> wishes <WG2309> to be first <WG4413> among <WG1722> you shall be your slave; <WG1401>
just <WG5618> as the Son <WG5207> of Man <WG444> did not come <WG2064> to be served, <WG1247> but to serve, <WG1247> and to give <WG1325> His life <WG5590> a ransom <WG3083> for many. <WG4183> "
And as they were going <WG1607> out from Jericho, <WG2410> a great <WG4183> multitude <WG3793> followed <WG190> Him.

And behold, <WG2400> two <WG1417> blind <WG5185> men <WG5185> sitting <WG2521> by the road, <WG3598> hearing <WG191> that Jesus <WG2424> was passing <WG3855> by, cried <WG2896> out, saying, <WG3004> "Lord, <WG2962> have <WG1653> mercy <WG1653> on us, Son <WG5207> of David! <WG7035>"

And the multitude <WG3793> sternly <WG2008> told <WG2008> them to be quiet; <WG4623> but they cried <WG2896> out all <WG3173> the more, <WG3173> saying, <WG3004> "Lord, <WG2962> have <WG1653> mercy <WG1653> on us, Son <WG5207> of David! <WG7035>"
And Jesus <WG2424> stopped <WG2476> and called <WG5455> them, and said, <WG3004> "What <WG5101> do you want <WG2309> Me to do <WG4160> for you?"
They said <WG3004> to Him, "Lord, <WG2962> [we want] our eyes <WG3788> to be opened. <WG455>"
And moved <WG4697> with compassion, <WG4697> Jesus <WG2424> touched <WG681> their eyes; <WG3659> and immediately <WG2112> they regained <WG308> their sight <WG308> and followed <WG190> Him.
